title: Star Wars Episodes I-III Dawn of the Empire - A Fan Edit
description:
Version 1.01

I put a lot of time and effort into this project and I must say, I believe that any die hard Star Wars fan will enjoy it. My goal was to alter or remove most of the things that make people role their eyes at the prequels whilst still having an enjoyable film that feels complete. You will find that all of the cuts are done to the best of my ability to make them flow from scene to scene as seamlessly as possible. A lot of my inspiration came from Ron Reynolds' edit that goes by a similar title. Now, there are still a few things that could use a bit of refining, which I may get around to doing in a future version. Let me know what you guys think.
